item.title: Celena add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Celena add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Harry was left to ponder in silence the depths to which girls would sink to get revenge." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Celena add a quote by John Green
item.description: "…because nerds like us are allowed to be unironically enthusiastic about stuff… Nerds are allowed to love stuff, like jump-up-and-down-in-the-chair-can’t-control-yourself love it. Hank, when people call people nerds, mostly what they’re saying is ‘you like stuff.’ Which is just not a good insult at all. Like, ‘you are too enthusiastic about the miracle of human consciousness’." -- John Green

item.title: Celena add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Celena add a quote by Sarah Vowell
item.description: "But when I am around strangers, I turn into a conversational Mount St. Helens. I'm dormant, dormant, quiet, quiet, old-guy loners build log cabins on the slopes of my silence and then, boom, it's 1980. Once I erupt, they'll be wiping my verbal ashes off their windshields as far away as North Dakota." -- Sarah Vowell

item.title: Celena add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food." -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Celena add a quote by Julia Child
item.description: "I was 32 when I started cooking; up until then, I just ate." -- Julia Child

item.title: Celena add a quote by Elizabeth Taylor
item.description: "Pour yourself a drink, put on some lipstick, and pull yourself together." -- Elizabeth Taylor
